text: The Defiant Ones is a 1958 American black and white movie which tells the story of two escaped prisoners, one white and one black, who are shackled together and who must co-operate in order to survive. It stars Tony Curtis, Sidney Poitier, Theodore Bikel, Cara Williams, Charles McGraw, and Lon Chaney, Jr.. Ivan Dixon was a stunt double for Sidney Poitier. == Other websites == * Category:1958 crime movies Category:1958 drama movies Category:1950s crime drama movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies directed by Stanley Kramer
title: The Defiant Ones
